005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
024
025public final class MapGet {
026  private static final String NAME = "get";
027  @NonNull
028  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
029      .name(NAME)
030      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
031      .deterministic()
032      .contextIndependent()
033      .focusIndependent()
034      .argument(IArgument.builder()
035          .name("map")
036          .type(IMapItem.class)
037          .one()
038          .build())
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("key")
041          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .returnType(IItem.class)
045      .returnZeroOrOne()
046      .functionHandler(MapGet::execute)
047      .build();
048
049  private MapGet() {
050    // disable construction
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
054  @NonNull
055  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
056      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
057      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
058      IItem focus) {
059    IMapItem<?> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
060    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
061
062    ICollectionValue value = get(map, key);
063    return value == null ? ISequence.empty() : value.asSequence();
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
068   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-get">map:get</a>.
069   *
070   * @param <V>
071   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
072   * @param map
073   *          the map of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
074   * @param key
075   *          the key for the item to retrieve
076   * @return the retrieved item
077   */
078  @Nullable
079  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> V get(
080      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
081      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
082    return map.get(key.asMapKey());
083  }
084}
